msbt.message: Other folks' homes feel so fancy. Your home would be nicer than mine, even with the same furniture.Maybe it's the smell?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, your bed looks real comfy.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yaaaaaaawrrrrn Can I borrow it?<10_4 /> I'll be careful not to drool.

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />There's so much stuff on TV! And so many channels. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What kinda TV shows do you usually watch?The news? Dramas? Comedies? Action? Adventure? Game shows? Very special episodes? Race cars?Heavy aerobics? Mouth fishing? Yelling movies? Snack pranks? Loud mountains? Traffic jumble?Cowboy parties? Weird burps? Folks blinking? Slap lasers? Suitcase dangles? Space soap?Flavor descriptions? Confusing pictures of bees? Sleeping contests? Smell reviews?What about that guy with the weird puppet?Huh? Me? I love the channel that shows what's on other channels!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Wow, you must really, really dig music, huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="6" />Maybe I'll sing, um... ?That sound good? OK Ahem!A huh huh huh! I can't remember how it goes, !
It's ?<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> Lemme see Hmm OK Good! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="6" />Your clock matches up with the clock in my tummy!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Rooms with plants have yummier air!<10_4 /> <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's because plants eat the gross air, then burp out good air!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />How many bath toys do you have?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I have 26.<10_4 /> Wait28! And I play with all of them every day! Even when I'm not in the bathtub!I gotta be careful, though. One of the toys looks like a grilled cheesebut it tastes like soap!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whaddaya look for when you're picking out a desk?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Height? Width? Depth? Color? Durability? Stability? Umami? Calories? Mouthfeel?A big desk would be neat! I could build a fort under it and hang out eating snacks all day!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your 's a real good chair, huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You can sit in a good chair for a looooong time without your legs falling asleep!One time, my legs fell asleep I was stuck on the toilet for DAYS.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Can you play the ?You should do a concert! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I can just hear it now "Songs to Snack By," as performed by !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? So you like cooking?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, I like eating! Gimme a call any time and I'll be your taste-tester!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Do you like your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I had one of those for a while, but it didn't have enough room to hang all my laundry.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?! You're going camping, aren't you?!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Camping's crazy! Ya go outside, then do everything ya can to make it like you're still indoors!
<20_2 arg="10" />Oh cool! I really like your .<20_2 arg="9" /><20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />No big, dark, scary shadows getting in the way of snack time here. Nuh-uh, !

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Hey, I've got a question about your <20_3 arg="6" />Does the other you in the mirror do exactly as you do?<20_3 arg="3" /><10_4 /> What's that look for? I'm just checking, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />How do you organize the clothes in your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I organize by color. That way I can dress based on what color juice stain will be on it later, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That's so cool that you live with .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Of all the roommates I've ever had, the bugs always had the best senses of humor, . Plus they never minded the mess.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa. I didn't know you got yourself .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I've been wanting a guard fish for my house too. It'd be way more interactive than a guard .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I walked in here and thought I had traveled back in time when I saw your . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />As fun as that sounds, I don't know what folks did before pizza delivery was a thing. Even thinking about it gives me the shakes, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is that a genuine, one-of-a-kind ? Really?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I always thought you were cool, but now I think you're like secret-spy double-life cool, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I just can't get over it. You have .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />For an inanimate object, it's got a whole lotta presence. It's almost buzzing with life, ! Wouldn't it be nuts if there was actually some kinda spirit trapped inside there waiting to be freed? A huh huh! I think I'm gonna keep my distance, if that's cool
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This room feels super classy thanks to your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe eventoo classy. Perhaps surspiciously classy, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've got a quick question about your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Have you ever used it to cool down super-hot food, ?Me neither. That time I splattered a plate of against the wall was totally unrelated.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm so, so, so, so jealous of your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's like you have your very own creature from outer space living with you all the time, !
<20_2 arg="10" />Aww, no way! <20_2 arg="9" />You've got a picture of me in here!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Huhis that how come I get the feeling lately I'm being watched?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You don't gotta be ashamed to have !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Folks say this stuff is just for kids, but bein' a kid at heart totally counts, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Do you get a lotta use outta your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Everyone has their thing. For me, it's , and for you, it's your .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's real handy having around.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You did a pretty good job making this stuff look like part of the room. Maybe I'll piggyback off your style!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You got a buncha cool stuff! Even .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wouldn't say I NEED that kinda stuff, but I kinda wish I had it every now and then, .
